name: Farm Frenzy 3: Madagascar
summary: Enjoy an all-new Farm Frenzy adventure set in stunning Madagascar! Join Scarlett as she travels to the exotic country to help the workers on a reservation save their animals, which have become sick for an unknown reason. Raise new, vividly animated indigenous creatures like guinea birds, elephants and water buffalo, construct and use new buildings, and manufacture exciting new products throughout 90 thrilling levels! Farm Frenzy 3: Madagascar also features more than a dozen visual gags and a captivating story. If you've been itching to get back on the farm, the wait is over!
